Introduction

Yeoeun (여은) is a South Korean singer under Dworks. She was a member of the girl group Melody Day. She was the winner of “King of Mask Singer” as Miss Pepper. She was a participant in The Unit. She made her solo debut on September 7, 2019 with the single "Fight Day". She works as a musical actress now.
